title: Schneider Electric unveils new grid, transmission solutions to maintain power during severe weather and wildfires
description: Schneider Electric announced new software solutions for utilities at DTECH to manage grid disruptions from severe weather and wildfires.
content: Schneider Electric announced new software solutions for utilities at DTECH to manage grid disruptions from severe weather and wildfires.
